segments.text: I am looking at this kitchen scene and it's quite something.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is completely overflowing, I can see the water running right over the edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a continuous sheet pouring onto the cabinets below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A puddle is forming on the floor, getting wider by the second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet is definitely on, water just keeps gushing out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I don't see any plug, but the drain isn't working at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is going to cause a lot of water damage very quickly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm honestly quite surprised by the sheer volume of water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a disaster in the making, and it's escalating fast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can already imagine the warping of the wood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is truly shocking to witness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to turn off that tap right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is already reaching her foot.
segments.speaker: PAR
